title: Under Armour Men's Performance 3.0 Polo
description: Textured, soft anti-pick, anti-pill fabric has a snag-free finish
4-way stretch material moves better in every direction
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
Updated placket with low-profile buttons for a modern, clean look

We actually upgraded one of the best-selling polos in the world. The fabric is now lighter and more breathable to keep you even cooler and more focused. Textured, soft anti-pick, anti-pill fabric has a snag-free finish. 4-way stretch material moves better in every direction. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Updated placket with low-profile buttons for a modern, clean look. Flat knit ribbed collar. 93% Polyester/7% Elastane.
